document_data.name: Gaurin
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaurin''' was an [[imp]] who also was [[Jesanta Beril]]'s familiar in the mid-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: A favourite tactic of the imp and his mistress was to have him touch targets while carrying her ''[[harm]]'' spell.
document_data.Personality: Curiously, Gaurin wasn't known to be evil.
document_data.Relationships: [[Jesanta Beril]] bound Gaurin after learning how to bind demons from [[Fareeansis]], then disguised as an old sage named Benedict; Jesanta named the imp after her [[Gaurin|late tutor]] in [[the Art]]. Curiously, Gaurin wasn't a demon but a devil.
